title: How to Make a Double Band Fishtail Loom Bracelet

steps.headline: Get two bands (color #1 & color #2).
steps.description: Twist the two bands into an infinity symbol and place onto two pegs.

steps.headline: Place color #3 & color #1 on top of the two pegs.
Put color #2 and color #3 above the other four bands.
Pull the bottom two bands on the left side up and over the peg.
steps.description: Repeat process on the right side.

steps.headline: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs on each side.
Repeat the process until bracelet is at desired length.
steps.description: Continue the pattern while doing so. Make sure that the bracelet can fit around your wrist.

steps.headline: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs again.
Pull the other two bands over the pegs.
steps.description: You should now have two bands on each side.

steps.headline: Pull the last two bands on the left side over the peg.
steps.description: Place a C or S clip on it. Repeat on the right side.

text: Making the Bracelet Get two bands (color #1 & color #2). Twist the two bands into an infinity symbol and place onto two pegs. Place color #3 & color #1 on top of the two pegs. Keep these two bands untwisted. Put color #2 and color #3 above the other four bands.  Pull the bottom two bands on the left side up and over the peg. Repeat process on the right side. Add color #1 & 2 on top.  Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs on each side.  Repeat the process until bracelet is at desired length. Continue the pattern while doing so. Make sure that the bracelet can fit around your wrist. Finishing the Bracelet Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs again.  Pull the other two bands over the pegs. You should now have two bands on each side. Pull the last two bands on the left side over the peg. Place a C or S clip on it. Repeat on the right side. Enjoy your new bracelet!
sentences: Making the Bracelet Get two bands (color #1 & color #2).
Twist the two bands into an infinity symbol and place onto two pegs.
Place color #3 & color #1 on top of the two pegs.
Put color #2 and color #3 above the other four bands.
Pull the bottom two bands on the left side up and over the peg.
Repeat process on the right side.
Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs on each side.
Repeat the process until bracelet is at desired length.
Continue the pattern while doing so.
Make sure that the bracelet can fit around your wrist.
Finishing the Bracelet Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs again.
Pull the other two bands over the pegs.
You should now have two bands on each side.
Pull the last two bands on the left side over the peg.
Place a C or S clip on it.
